_comment: OPTIMIZED FOR COMPLETE SPEECH AND VIDEO CAPTURE
_description: This configuration ensures ALL words are captured with no cutoffs
_comment_silence: Increased to 1800ms to handle natural pauses between words
_comment_max_segment: Maximum recording duration - 45 seconds for long responses
_comment_vad: VAD aggressiveness 1 = most sensitive, catches all speech
_comment_pre_roll: Pre-roll buffer of 600ms captures audio BEFORE wake word
_comment_min_speech: Minimum 5 speech frames before allowing silence cutoff
_comment_tail_padding: Capture extra 500ms after speech ends to avoid cutoffs
_comment_noise_gate: Zero-out low-level background noise before Vosk (disabled by default)
_comment_wake: Wake word variants for Vosk fallback
_comment_wake_sensitivity: Not used with Porcupine, only for Vosk fallback
